dataIdInfo.idPurp: Toolbox version of functions incorporated into the Automated Projection Selection for ArcGIS (ArcMap Python Add-in). Provides the user with the opportunity to run the following tools: Projection Selection only for an area of interest and purpose, i.e. without assessing the distortion of the candidate projections; Distortion Assessment for a chosen .prj file and the user's area of interest and purpose; Geographic Centre determination using the iterative process based on the azimuthal equidistant projection; Fibonacci Lattice generation of equally spaced assessment points.

searchKeys.keyword: projection selection distortion geographic centre center fibonacci lattice
